guardian.title: Sim card database hack gave US and UK spies access to billions of cellphones
guardian.topComment: Well, that seems a pretty blatant violation of the CFAA, and considering that tends to lead to draconian sentencing, I trust all involved will go away for a 100+ years, right?

guardian.title: Polar vortex to bring coldest weather in decades to the US
guardian.topComment: My heart goes out to all the disadvantaged people.

guardian.title: Walmart to boost pay for half a million workers

guardian.title: Leaders discuss crumbling Ukraine ceasefire as fighting continues
guardian.topComment: So in 2014 Russia breached Budapest memorandum, signed in 1994, Russian-Ukrainian Friendship Treaty, signed in 1997, not counting lesser treaties and agreements. Russia breached Minsk agreements signed in September 2014 by not closing the border and ...
